description: [Mispadu](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1122) can steal credentials from Google Chrome.(Citation: SCILabs Malteiro 2021)(Citation: ESET Security Mispadu Facebook Ads 2019)(Citation: Metabase Q Mispadu Trojan 2023)
